data.text: Mekpɔ Aƒetɔ la wòle tsitre ɖe vɔsamlekpui la gbɔ, eye wògblɔ nam be,
Ne woƒu du yi keke tsiẽƒe hã la,
Togbɔ be woasi aɖabe ɖe agakpe siwo
Togbɔ be woƒe futɔwo akplɔ wo ayi aboyo me hã la,
Ame si tu nɔƒe kɔkɔwo ɖe dziƒonutowo me,
“Aƒetɔ Yehowa ƒe ŋkuwo le fiaɖuƒe sẽto la ŋuti.
“Elabena meɖe gbe, eye matsra Israel ƒe aƒe la
Nu vɔ̃ wɔla siwo le nye dukɔ me la
“Ekema le ɣe ma ɣi me la,
ale be woaxɔ Edom ƒe ame mamlɛawo
Maɖo Israel ɖe eya ŋutɔ ƒe anyigba dzi,
